actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A joint resolution to require the President to correct inequities resulting from Federal regulations governing the allocation of motor gasoline.

summary.text: Directs the President to ensure that Federal regulations allocate motor gasoline as equitably as possible consistent with the respective needs of the regions and areas of the United States.

titles.title: A joint resolution to require the President to correct inequities resulting from Federal regulations governing the allocation of motor gasoline.
